ygData.subject: MDs and Experience Levels
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve thought there should be a point in the game when you should your character should be promoted from a normal character to something like minority

I've thought there should be a point in the game when you should your 
character should be promoted from a "normal" character to something 
like "minority diety".  This would occur when a character gets 
somewhere between 1 million and 10 million experience points.  At that 
point in the game, the character would get bonuses.  One being having 
access to one potion of everything with a thought once per scenario.

Any way, at the point of becoming an md, the scale starts back at 1, 
but it's extremely difficult (more so than normally gaining higher 
experience levels) to climb up that ladder.  Also, to make it clear, 
it should not be possible to place an md in any scenario.

With the curteousy of scenario #401 and other scenarios from my 
tortured set, it's impossible in the current game to boost a soldier 
beyond level 200 without crashing the game.  Yet, I can bring a mage 
up to level 500 without crashing the game.  [Note: one reason I want 
mds is just to put a cap on max normal experience level for 
characters.]
